description: This notification is sent when Tunnel status Changes.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChange CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIPType i 0 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIP s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType i 1 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChangeReasonCode i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChange CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIPType i 0 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIP s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType i 1 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChangeReasonCode i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChange CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIPType i 0 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIP s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType i 1 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChangeReasonCode i 3

description: This object represents tunnel gateway name.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwName

description: This object represents the IP address type of tunnel
gateway IP.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIPType

description: This object represents tunnel gateway IP.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelGwIP

description: This object represents tunnel type.
none - unknown tunnel.
pmipv6 - pmipv6 tunnel type .
gtpv2 - gtpv2 tunnel type .
eogre - eogre tunnel type.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType

description: This object represents tunnel status reason code
down - Tunnel is down
up - Tunnel is up
progress - Client deletion for that tunnel in progress.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelStatusChangeReasonCode

description: This notification is sent when Active Gateway
is changed in a Domain.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelDomainStatusChange CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelDomainName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType i 1 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIPType i 0 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIP s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwName s EXAMPLE

description: This object represents tunnel domain name.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelDomainName

description: This object represents tunnel type.
none - unknown tunnel.
pmipv6 - pmipv6 tunnel type .
gtpv2 - gtpv2 tunnel type .
eogre - eogre tunnel type.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType

description: This object represents the IP address type of the
active tunnel gateway IP in domain.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIPType

description: This object represents active gateway IP in domain.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIP

description: This object represents active gateway name in domain.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwName

description: This notification is sent when client type is
marked as eogre tunnel user.

event.Summary: Client type changed to EoGRE tunnel user due to $v10

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelClientTypeChange CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelClientMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelProfileName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelRealm s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelVlanId u 9999 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelDomainName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType i 1 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIPType i 0 CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIP s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwName s EXAMPLE CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelClientTypeChangeReasonCode i 1

description: This object represents the MAC address of the
client for this entry.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelClientMacAddress

description: This object represents tunnel profile name.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelProfileName

description: This object represents realm of the user.
eg. In airtel@a.com username, a.com is realm of the user
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelRealm

description: This object represents tunnel vlan Id.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelVlanId

description: This object represents tunnel domain name.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelDomainName

description: This object represents tunnel type.
none - unknown tunnel.
pmipv6 - pmipv6 tunnel type .
gtpv2 - gtpv2 tunnel type .
eogre - eogre tunnel type.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelType

description: This object represents the IP address type of the
active tunnel gateway IP in domain.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIPType

description: This object represents active gateway IP in domain.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwIP

description: This object represents active gateway name in domain.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelActiveGwName

description: This object represents client type change from simple to EoGRE.
staticProfile - This indicates WLAN static profile is
applied.
AAAOveride - This indicates that AAA override
parameters are applied.
dot1xAuthentication - This indicates that dot1x authentication
is completed.
mobilityHandoff - This indicates that mobility handoff
has happened.
variables.name: CISCO-LWAPP-TUNNEL-MIB::cLWATunnelClientTypeChangeReasonCode
